_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: SA-MP
author: bl4ckspr4y@protonmail.com
description: SA-MP is a free Massively Multiplayer Online game mod for the PC version of Rockstar Games Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas (tm).

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt -y update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install curl unzip lib32gcc1 ca-certificates

cd /tmp
curl -sSL -o samp.tar.gz http://files.sa-mp.com/samp037svr_R2-1.tar.gz

mkdir -p /mnt/server
tar -xzvf samp.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/
cp -r /mnt/server/samp03/* /mnt/server
rm -rf /mnt/server/samp03/
cd /mnt/server
sed -i '3d' /mnt/server/server.cfg
echo "rcon_password changemeplease" >> /mnt/server/server.cfg

chown -R root:root /mnt

export HOME=/mnt/server
